transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Hanji.
Customer: Ha sir, mera whatsapp kal ban ho gaya.
Executive: Whatsapp ban kaise?
Customer: Wo matlab daily daily message karna jyada jyada isliye.
Executive: Kya ho gaya sir?
Customer: Ha. Isi ban ho gaya?
Customer: Mera whatsapp number jo verify number hai na business ka.
Executive: Ji ji.
Customer: Wo ban ho gaya.
Executive: Number ek bar bataiye.
Customer: 7908

Executive: One second.

Executive: 7908
Customer: 95
Executive: Ji.
Customer: 3119.

Executive: One second.


Executive: To aap call bhi kar pa rahe hain?
Customer: Ha matlab waha pe wo message wagera to nahi ho raha hai.
Executive: Ji abhi aaj hi issue aaya hai?
Customer: Matlab kal hua hai. Kal hua hai maine mail kara hai. Waha pe kuch solution nahi hua.
Executive: Kidhar mail kara tha?
Customer: Whatsapp support me.
Executive: Achcha. Google pe hamara ek tag dikha raha hai, sunao pe.

Executive: Ek minute check kar raha hu.

Executive: Deliver nahi hua message aap pe.
Customer: 
Executive: Aapke whatsapp pe kara hai but deliver nahi hua.
Customer: Ha deliver nahi hua.
Executive: Single tick aa raha hai.
Customer: Ha wo to ban hai isliye single tick dikha raha hai.
Executive: To kis wajah se ban hua?
Customer: Matlab message ke liye aisa hota hai. Thik hai, aisa hota hai fir ho jata hai matlab char panch bar aisa hua hai mere sath.
Executive: To isme IndiaMART ka sona koi wo hai sir?
Customer: Matlab IndiaMART ka jo sab message kar rahe ho na isliye ban hota hai. Sab jitna jyada message karunga na isliye ban hota hai.
Executive: To ye aapko business account hai ya normal wo hai?
Customer: Business account hai. Whatsapp business.

Executive: Whatsapp business to nahi ban hona chahiye.
Customer: Nahi char panch bar hua hai ek aad bar nahi.
Executive: To wapis kaise khulta hai?
Customer: Automatic khul jata hai mail karne ke baad.
Executive: Achcha. Ek to abhi ravi ravi ko time waste hota hai thik hai isliye bata raha hu jo uska kya solution hai.
Executive: Ye hum backend me ek bar mail kar dete hain.
Customer: Ha backend me mail kar dijiye iska koi kya karna hoga bata dijiye ek do dobara na ho. Are aaj hua hai ya kal se hua hai?
Executive: Nahi kal hua hai kal.
Executive: Achcha. Aapke pass hamara dusra number nahi hai sir number note kariye.
Customer: Aapka number?
Executive: Hanji.
Customer: Ha.
Executive: 8950
Customer: 8950
Executive: 83
Customer: 83
Executive: 11
Customer: 11
Executive: 79
Customer: 79
Executive: Ispe call kara kariye sir. Aap hamesha na 96 pe call karte hain.
Customer: Thik hai.
Executive: Wo number save kar lijiye. IndiaMART ki taraf se usi pe hi call karna hai. Baki ye thodi der me aapko
Customer: Ha.
Executive: Check karwa ke call. Udhar se. Hanji.
Customer: Aapko udhar se call aayega fir se IndiaMART se. Ha ha ha ha bilkul.
Executive: Thik hai sir?
Customer: Thik hai.
Executive: Ji.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's WhatsApp business account got banned.

- Wants a solution to prevent future bans.



Resolution:

- Executive will mail the issue to the backend team.

- Provided an alternate IndiaMART contact number.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will receive a call after checking.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Annoyed -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- whatsapp ban, business account, contact number
